Hell Sword

two handed weapon (lvl 6)

item id [id]: 109
resist fire [fireres]: +10
berserk when wounded [berserk]: +3
weap id [weapon]: 241 (Hell Sword)
damage [dmg]: 14 Partial Life Drain
attack [att]: +5
defence [def]: +1
length [len]: 2
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
 
(Requires Two Hands [twohanded], Slashing Damage [slash], Magic weapon [magic])

Requires 10B10F to forge (B2F2)

A sword infused with the power of blood sacrifice, it will drain the life force of anyone struck by its blade and give that life force to its wielder. The sword also grants its wielder partial protection from fire and the ability to go berserk.
